name: Franks in Peanut Butter and Chutney
author: Marc Boyer
summary: The sauce can be used with any frank or wiener. Using cocktail wieners would be more elegant than cut-up franks. You will need toothpicks for this recipe. The flavor improves upon reheating.
directions: Cut each frank into five bite-sized pieces, unless you're using cocktail wieners
In a large saucepan, combine peanut butter, chutney, chicken stock, corn syrup,  Heat and stir constantly until very smooth
Add franks and continue stirring carefully until franks are covered with sauce
Reduce heat and continue to heat slowly until franks are hot
Insert toothpicks into frankfurters and serve
